title: Adjunct Professor Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at Delaware State University
Interview Descriptions: interview with 2 people for position described my professional experience interviews was done virtually and on time interview was not length and was done in a short amount of time
Interview Questions: Why are you interested in this position? Why are you a good candidate for this position?

title: Assistant Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at Delaware State University
Interview Descriptions: The interview process was really quick did not take long to get an interview and the questions were fairly easy. The whole interview took about 15 mins and it was virtual as well which was convenient for me
Interview Questions: What are some of your weaknesses.

title: Student Affairs Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at Delaware State University
Interview Descriptions: The interview process was quick. But the wait following the interview can be anywhere from 1-2 months. Additionally, three references are requested before getting an idea of you are being considered as a top candidate. They do not move swiftly, and there is very little communication along the way.
Interview Questions: Why do you want to work with students in higher education?

title: Online Coordinator Interview
Application Type: The process took 4 weeks. I interviewed at Delaware State University
Interview Descriptions: Probably the worst interview experience I’ve been apart of.  The head of the department emailed me a day or two before the times she gave me to meet. Then when I joined, it was a panel interview, not a “meetup” like our exchange said. I also found it unprofessional that one of the people on this panel didn’t even have their camera turned on. After the disastrous “behavioral” type questions you could tell they were reading from a paper, they didn’t even let me finish asking the questions I had, despite still being well within the timeframe for the scheduled interview.
Interview Questions: Where do you see yourself in 5 years.

title: Adjunct Professor Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at Delaware State University
Interview Descriptions:
The interviewer was positive and allowed opportunity for me to obtain additional necessary documentation to be successful. Very compassionate and considerate. 

She was understanding and listened attentively as I answered the questions. I could tell she really cared about my success.
Interview Questions: Can you submit 3 printed recommendation letters?

title: Peer Analyst Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 4 weeks. I interviewed at Delaware State University
Interview Descriptions: short simple and easy. I applied online and got called after a month of waiting. then i had to go to the school to take my interview . i waited about two to four weeks to hear back from them. after that, I had to wait another mount to actually start work because pay role took forever.
Interview Questions: they were based on my past experiences and what i could bring to the table

title: Adjunct Professor Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Delaware State University (Dover, DE) in Aug 2018
Interview Descriptions: Very professional.  Cared about my career development.  Gave clear direction on next steps.  Delivered information about classroom locations/times.  Discussed expectations, along with faculty meetings.  Worked with HR to secure ID, parking pass, etc. Very friendly and not a hint of snootiness.
Interview Questions: What is your teaching experience?    What platforms have you used in the past?

title: Administrative Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Delaware State University (Dover, DE) in Nov 2016
Interview Descriptions: Applied Online through the university website in Oct 16, Received a call for the interview in Nov 16.   Received a letter in Apr 17 notifying me I did not get the position.
Interview Questions: If the boss was in a meeting in his office and you were told not to send any calls through, and you received a call from someone stating they needed to talk the boss that it was important, what would you do?

title: Research Fellow Interview
Application Type: I applied through college or university. The process took 2 months. I interviewed at Delaware State University (Dover, DE) in Jun 2013
Interview Descriptions: You must submit you CV, transcripts and a research summary. Then, they can call you for interview if they want to learn more about you. Otherwise, they will tell their decision on the basis of what you submitted.
Interview Questions: They asked how this fellowship can help me in my career and how can I contribute to this project.

title: Assistant Professor Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 7 months. I interviewed at Delaware State University (Dover, DE) in Apr 2012
Interview Descriptions: disorganized and didn't know the details until 5 pm the day before traveling
Interview Questions: No major questions were asked
